name: Hell Fire
description:
This is the journey of a man named Grills to stop the New-New-Postapocalypse. He will gather friends along the way, but will it be enough for this deranged individual to save the world.

Composer - SHIN#013 ( https://shin013.bandcamp.com/ )

Designer/Tile Art/Writer - Kirby012 ( nathanmicro012@gmail.com )

Character Sprites - Wally ( https://twitter.com/soldier_gaia )

This game was made in RPGMaker VXace

Currently working on making more unique assets.

THIS VERSION ENDS AFTER GOING THROUGH THE SNOWY CHECKPOINT.
